iOS v3.9 Change log:

This is a BIG update. To learn more about this change, please visit 2doapp.com/blog

2Do is now FREE to download and use / try. Your existing purchases have not gone to waste - please carry on reading, you get upgraded to

iOS v3.9 Change log:

This is a BIG update. To learn more about this change, please visit 2doapp.com/blog

2Do is now FREE to download and use / try. Your existing purchases have not gone to waste - please carry on reading, you get upgraded to

Patch update:
* NEW: Trial period of Pro features increased to 21 days instead of 14
* Fixed: Task Editor toolbar options at times would become unresponsive on iPads
* Fixed: Pro status for some new users would get reset after a while
* Fixed:

Patch update:
* NEW: Trial period of Pro features increased to 21 days instead of 14
* Fixed: Task Editor toolbar options at times would become unresponsive on iPads
* Fixed: Pro status for some new users would get reset after a while
* Fixed:

* [NEW] Double tap on the date picker when setting due times / start times or alerts to switch between 1 minute and 5 minute intervals
* Workaround for an iOS 10 bug that would trigger the device to reboot at random times
* Fixed a bug where the ap

* [NEW] Double tap on the date picker when setting due times / start times or alerts to switch between 1 minute and 5 minute intervals
* Workaround for an iOS 10 bug that would trigger the device to reboot at random times
* Fixed a bug where the ap

* Fixed a bug where custom list colors picker would appear clipped at the bottom
* Fixed a bug where alerts for some users weren't being registered properly
* Fixed a bug with sync where some users reported issues around sub-tasks and lists not reme

* Fixed a bug where custom list colors picker would appear clipped at the bottom
* Fixed a bug where alerts for some users weren't being registered properly
* Fixed a bug with sync where some users reported issues around sub-tasks and lists not reme

iOS 8 / 9 users, important note: This update is not currently compatible with iOS 8 / 9. We're working on a compatibility fix for you. Please skip this update if at all possible. Apologies, but support for older iOS versions was inadvertently removed. In

iOS 8 / 9 users, important note: This update is not currently compatible with iOS 8 / 9. We're working on a compatibility fix for you. Please skip this update if at all possible. Apologies, but support for older iOS versions was inadvertently removed. In

* The previous update inadvertently removed support for iOS 8 / 9. This update restores it back. Now everyone can enjoy 2Do again across iOS 8, 9 and 10.
* Further performance improvements, bug & stability fixes


iOS v3.9 Change log:
<

* The previous update inadvertently removed support for iOS 8 / 9. This update restores it back. Now everyone can enjoy 2Do again across iOS 8, 9 and 10.
* Further performance improvements, bug & stability fixes


iOS v3.9 Change log:
<

* Ongoing fixes and improvements
* Improved alert registration for users with a LOT of pending alerts. Upcoming alerts are now prioritized.
* Fixed an issue where the counters appearing on the top toolbar would at times not appear
* Performance i

* Ongoing fixes and improvements
* Improved alert registration for users with a LOT of pending alerts. Upcoming alerts are now prioritized.
* Fixed an issue where the counters appearing on the top toolbar would at times not appear
* Performance i

* Improvements to Email to 2Do by adding keyword support to the subject line. You can now specify the following properties:
1) List for the task
2) Start / Due date
3) Priority
4) Tags
5) Actions

An example is as follows:

Prep

* Improvements to Email to 2Do by adding keyword support to the subject line. You can now specify the following properties:
1) List for the task
2) Start / Due date
3) Priority
4) Tags
5) Actions

An example is as follows:

Prep

• iPhone X support

• Improved URL detection of 3rd party apps inside of notes

v3.10.1:

• CSV exports now export completion date and times
• Fixed a couple of glitches with notes editing
• Fixed loss of initial focus in Notes when used in split-screen mode

* Workaround for Siri not recognizing "to do" or "2Do". You can now refer to 2Do as "Daily", e.g. "Using my Daily app, remind me to drop my clothes at the dryers".
* Fixed issue with nag alerts and repeating tasks
* Fixed a bug where long-tap popove

* Fixed a visual bug where the due time field was being clipped in the Due Date picker
* Ongoing stability improvements
